trans-unit.target: Viele Grüße,
das COIS-Team.
Gesendet von den kollaborativen IVENA Statistiken
E-Mail Adresse betätigen

trans-unit.resname: Your E-Mail address for COIS - Collaborative IVENA statistics has been changed. Please confirm your new email address by clicking the following button.
trans-unit.source: Your E-Mail address for COIS - Collaborative IVENA statistics has been changed. Please confirm your new email address by clicking the following button.
trans-unit.target: Ihre E-Mail Adresse bei den kollaborativen IVENA Statistiken wurde geändert, bitte betätigen Sie Ihre neue E-Mail Adresse.
Hier klicken um die E-Mail Adresse zu bestätigen

trans-unit.resname: Please note that this link expires in %expiration% hours.
trans-unit.source: Please note that this link expires in %expiration% hours.
trans-unit.target: Bitte beachten Sie, dass dieser Link in %expiration% Stunden ungültig wird.
__Reset your password

trans-unit.resname: A reset of your password has been requested. To proceed click on the link below, or copy and paste it to your browser. If you didn´t request it by yourself, please ignore this e-mail.
trans-unit.source: A reset of your password has been requested. To proceed click on the link below, or copy and paste it to your browser. If you didn´t request it by yourself, please ignore this e-mail.
trans-unit.target: Wir haben eine Anfrage zum Zurücksetzen Ihres Passwortes erhalten. Um Fortzufahren klicken Sie bitte auf den unten stehenden Link. Falls Sie dies nicht selbst beantragt haben, ignorieren Sie bitte diese E-Mail.
Mein Password zurücksetzen
Willkommen, %username%!

trans-unit.resname: Welcome to COIS - Collaborative IVENA statistics, we are looking forward to your participation in our project and can`t wait for your first data.
trans-unit.source: Welcome to COIS - Collaborative IVENA statistics, we are looking forward to your participation in our project and can`t wait for your first data.
trans-unit.target: Willkommen bei den kollaborativen IVENA Statistiken! Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Mitarbeit an diesem Projekt und hoffen bald Ihre ersten Daten zu empfangen.

trans-unit.resname: An account has been created for you with the username: %username%.
trans-unit.source: An account has been created for you with the username: %username%.
trans-unit.target: Ein Konto mit dem Benutzernamen %username% wurde für Sie angelegt.
Hier klicken zum Anmelden

trans-unit.resname: Your initial password should have already been submitted to you by the administrator, you will have to change it immediately after your first login.
trans-unit.source: Your initial password should have already been submitted to you by the administrator, you will have to change it immediately after your first login.
trans-unit.target: Ein erstes Passwort wurde für Sie vom Administrator festgelegt und wird an Sie übermittelt werden. Das Passwort muss bei der ersten Anmeldung geändert werden.
Want to upload new data?
Hey there %username%!

trans-unit.resname: Have you noticed? Yet another month has passed. And you know what? We think that is a great moment to upload some new data to our project!
trans-unit.source: Have you noticed? Yet another month has passed. And you know what? We think that is a great moment to upload some new data to our project!
trans-unit.target: Have you noticed? Yet another month has passed. And you know what? We think that is a great moment to upload some new data to our project!

trans-unit.resname: But how do you ask? Very good question. The process is simple: Just login into IVENA, dump all the allocations from the last month as .CSV file and submit them via our form.
trans-unit.source: But how do you ask? Very good question. The process is simple: Just login into IVENA, dump all the allocations from the last month as .CSV file and submit them via our form.
trans-unit.target: But how do you ask? Very good question. The process is simple: Just login into IVENA, dump all the allocations from the last month as .CSV file and submit them via our form.

trans-unit.resname: Click here to upload new data
trans-unit.source: Click here to upload new data
trans-unit.target: Click here to upload new data
